attributes.action: Sue government over mismanagement of our money
attributes.additional_details: I think this government and this includes past governments should be sued by the British population for mismanagement of our money. In the media they state the government have to spend '???'on various things but the government don't have any money it's the taxpayers money. Giving themselves rises above the rate of inflation when most taxpayers have had no increases in their pay for at least 2 years. Most of the. Population spout about how they are sick of about the government (whichever one is in power but what do they do about it well stand up to what you want).
